verbose_text: We found that pMDR1 (-1202) activity was greatly increased by TGF-beta1 stimulation, histone deacetylase (HDAC) inhibitor panobinostat (LBH589) treatment, co-transfection with histone H3, Smad2, or Smad3 plasmids.
evidence: pMDR1(-1202) activity was greatly increased by TGF-beta1 stimulation, histone deacetylase (HDAC) inhibitor panobinostat
